title: A code first guide to SwAV self-supervised learning
description: With PyTorch-Lightning Bolts we build a practical use case for self-supervised learning.
contents:
Contents
Self-Supervised Learning 101

Self-Supervised Learning 101
Transformers have transformed the entire field of NLP and more recently, they are making advances in computer vision as well. Currently they are at par with ResNet50. One of the key training paradigms that has enabled this is self-supervised learning.
